package.description:
Various wrappers around OpenCV capabilities including:
cv_view*: wrappers around the OpenCV HighGUI image viewer. It just shows images flying across the ROS botnet.
cv_movie_streamer: A wrapper around the stellar OpenCV + ffmpeg movie-reading capabilities. Just give it a movie file on the command line and it will blast out images.
cv_cam_calib: A wrapper for the OpenCV image calibration code. Just give a bunch of image files as arguments to this executable, and it will try to use the OpenCV automatic calibration routines to estimate the camera intrinsics.
package.author: Morgan Quigley
